sites/all/modules/contrib/cck/modules/fieldgroup/fieldgroup-simple.tpl.php File Reference


Variables

if($content) if($label) if($description) endif
print $content

Detailed Description

Default theme implementation to display the a 'simple-styled' fieldgroup.

Available variables:

  • $group_name - The group name
  • $group_name_css - The css-compatible group name.
  • $label - The group label
  • $description - The group description
  • $content - The group content

See also:
template_preprocess_fieldgroup_simple()
